summary: REQ-16 (smart blue theme via Tailwind CSS variable tokens) appears implemented by updating global CSS variables in frontend/src/index.css to a blue OKLCH palette (background/muted/accent/primary/ring/etc.) and by adjusting section/footer background utility usage to show the new tints. However, the diff also introduces non-requested content/attribution changes in the Footer and non-requested documentation-style changes in frontend-file-summaries.txt that describe major page/content changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer content was changed/expanded (company description copy, attribution link to caffeine.ai, © 2026 line, heart icon), which goes beyond “only adjust background/theme colors” and adds new content.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest non-goal explicitly disallows adding new content blocks; only background/theme colors should be adjusted.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated frontend-file-summaries.txt to claim extensive non-theme changes (e.g., Home page repositioning, detailed service offerings, SEO/meta hooks, etc.) that were not requested as part of the smart-blue theme update.
hallucinated_features.reason: These are not requested by REQ-16 and suggest additional scope unrelated to adjusting theme tokens/background colors.
